bike.description: Globe A1 Premium Aluminum, w/ fender and rack braze-ons, integrated kickstand mount

components.description: Globe curved-blade aluminum with classic design
1 1/8" Ahead, loose ball retainers, cold forged Cr-Mo cups
All Rounder City alloy riser bar, 25.4mm, 600mm wide, 61 degree front, 75 degree back sweep
Cartridge bearing, square spindle w/ crank stop right side, capless bolts
Jalco 700c, double wall, pin joint, 32h w/ machined side wall & stainless eyelets
Forged alloy high flange phone-dial hub, double sealed, ground race
Specialized Infinity 700 x 28c, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Infinity 700 x 28c, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Globe forged alloy extra slim clamp, 31.8mm
Globe aluminum chain guard for internal gearing
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
